item.description: Easy of Leetcode ğŸ”—// 1. func twoSum(nums []int, target int) []int { var items = make(map[int]int, len(nums)) for k, v := range nums { if itemKey, ok := items[target-v]; ok { return []int{itemKey, k} } items[v] = k } return []int{} } // 9. func isPalindrome(x int) bool { var oldNum, newNum, position int oldNum = x for x > 0 { position = x % 10 newNum = newNum*10 + position x = x / 10 } return oldNum == newNum } // 13.
